name: SimplyDark Pandora [PANDORA PREMIUM WEB SUPPORT]
description: A dark take on Pandora's beautiful new design, for your enjoyment. I think I've covered everything! If I missed something or something is not working correctly, please let me know! Your feedback is much appreciated; I don't always catch all the missing pieces.

user.name: EpikYummeh
user.about: Software developer and avid music listener with a love for dark website styles. Check out some of my work!

additional_info: Updated style for compatibility with both light and dark theme using the dynamic background color picked from album art. 4/26 I have updated the style to work with the release of Pandora Premium for desktop web. Let me know if I missed anything. 2/24/18 Pandora made now playing main view song info text a lot smaller. I increased the size of this text, as well as some other minor fixes (event information displays better, a show more anchor had a white background, and links in artist bios was too dark). 10/1/17 Album art background in "Now Playing" has returned and background recolor in general was cleaned up. Thumbprint Radio now has a thumbnail image rather than being a blank square. Fixed black nav text on My Stations. 8/3/17 Fixed unreadable text and white background on "see all results" search page 7/15/17 All tuner controls, including thumb down button, now properly respect their "active" status. Added support for upgrading to Pandora Plus/Premium, and made some more text readable. 5/25/17 Added support for station details/editor view. 4/14/17 Fixed the rogue bright blue strip at the bottom of the page below the footer, and fixed the bright splash screen! Enjoy! 4/13/17 Tags: pandora dark theme style recolor new pandora site design support update updated site pandora plus pandora premium
